scripts.install: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.reinstall:backend: cd backend && python3 -m pip install --force-reinstall -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/.vite && rm -rf backend/__pycache__ backend/*.pyc backend/venv backend/env
